snippet: Four men, including three Americans, were killed when two Palestinian assailants stormed a synagogue. A police officer and the attackers also died.
abstract: Two Palestinians armed with gun, knives and axes storm synagogue in Jerusalem, killing four men, including three Americans; assailants are killed at scene, along with police officer; politicians and others worldwide condemn attack, worst in city since 2008, and its sectarian nature.

byline.original: By JODI RUDOREN and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Said Ghazali and Irit Pazner Garshowitz from Jerusalem; Majd Al Waheidi from Gaza; Michael R. Gordon from London; and Peter Baker, Michael D. Shear and Michael S. Schmidt from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Four men, including three Americans, were killed when two Palestinian assailants stormed a synagogue. A police officer and the attackers also died.

headline.main: Israel Shaken by 5 Deaths in Synagogue Assault
headline.print_headline: Israel Shaken by 5 Deaths in Synagogue Assault
